meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>hard</kanji> <kanji>stubborn</kanji> person is very <vocabulary>stubborn</vocabulary> no matter how you look at them. Try to break through that hard stubbornness and all you'll find is more stubborn.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
